alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:30AM PST until February 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Heavy snow in the Sierra tonight through Tuesday evening with low snow levels... .A cold weather system will bring moderate to heavy snow to the northern Sierra Nevada tonight and Tuesday leading to significant travel impacts across the passes. Lowering snow levels on Tuesday may bring a dusting of snow down into the lower foothill elevations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on slippery road conditions. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized amounts up to 8 inches, are expected. * WHERE...Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley and Western Plumas County/Lassen Park. * WHEN...4 PM today to 10 PM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibility at times, chain requirements and travel delays. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
